articles.title: The Santa Rosa City Local Hero
articles.text: Santa Rosa city has its own local hero, his name is Col. Basilio Barroma Gonzalez.

articles.title: The Tiongco Brothers
articles.text: The Tiongco Brothers (Fernando, Emilio, and Arthuro) are well-known pop artists in the "50s to "70s.

articles.title: The 17th City Hood Anniversary
articles.text: The Lion City of the South celebrates its 17th anniversary of the declaration of cityhood on July 10.
